Device.Name: STM32MP1
Device.Description: ARM 32-bit Cortex-A7 and ARM 32-bit Cortex-M4 dualprocessor based device, CPU clock up to 600MHz

Bit.Name: none
Bit.Description: none

Bit.Name: TR
Bit.Description: set SAFMEM Ring current level, default value = 0b00

Bit.Name: PRGWIDTH
Bit.Description: SAFMEM Programming Pulse Width, default value = 0b0001

Bit.Name: FRC
Bit.Description: SAFMEM CLOCK frequency range selection, default value = 0b11

Bit.Name: PWRUP
Bit.Description: SAFMEM Power up control

Bit.Name: BIST2LOCK
Bit.Description: 0: BIST2 is not locked, 1: BIST2 is locked.

Bit.Name: BIST1LOCK
Bit.Description: 0: BIST1 is not locked, 1: BIST1 is locked.

Bit.Name: PWRON
Bit.Description: 0: SAFMEM is in Power Off, 1: SAFMEM is in Power On.

Bit.Name: PROGFAIL
Bit.Description: 0: SAFMEM last programming was successful, 1: SAFMEM last programming failed.

Bit.Name: BUSY
Bit.Description: 0: SAFMEM is Idle, 1: SAFMEM operation is on going.

Bit.Name: INVALID
Bit.Description: 0: OTP mode is not OTP-INVALID, 1: OTP mode is OTP-INVALID.

Bit.Name: FULLDBG
Bit.Description: 0: OTP mode is OTP-OPEN1, 1: OTP mode is OTP-OPEN2.

Bit.Name: SECURE
Bit.Description: 0: OTP mode is not OTP-SECURED, 1: OTP mode is OTP-SECURED.

Bit.Name: GPLOCK
Bit.Description: 0: SAFMEM Programming is allowed, 1: SAFMEM Programming is disabled until next sytem reste.

Bit.Name: FENREG
Bit.Description: 0: BSEC_FENABLE register is not Locked, 1: BSEC_FENABLE register is Locked until the next System-Reset.

Bit.Name: DENREG
Bit.Description: 0: BSEC_DENABLE register is not Locked, 1: BSEC_DENABLE register is Locked until the next System-Reset.

Bit.Name: OTP
Bit.Description: 0: upper OTP region access is not locked, 1: upper OTP region access is Locked until the next System-Reset, when locked, the upper region OTP can not be R out from SAFMEM.

Bit.Name: DBGSWENABLE
Bit.Description: Control Self Hosted Debug enable with signal dbgswenable. 0: memory-mapped accesses to all ETM registers are disabled and return Error, 1: no effect on external debugger accesses.

Bit.Name: CFGSDISABLE
Bit.Description: Write access to secure GIC registers disable with signal: cfgsdisable. 0: no effect, all GIC registers can be accessed, 1: Disable write access to some Secure GIC registers.

Bit.Name: CP15SDISABLE
Bit.Description: Write access to some secure Cortex-A7 CP15 registers is disabled for CPUx. 0: All CP15 registers can be accessed, 1: Disable write access to some Secure CP15 registers into Cortex-A7 corresponding CPU.

Bit.Name: SPNIDEN
Bit.Description: Secure Privilege Non Invasive Debug enable with signal spiden. 0: Secure Privilege Non Invasive Debug Disabled, 1: Secure Privilege Non Invasive Debug Enabled.

Bit.Name: SPIDEN
Bit.Description: Secure Privilege Invasive Debug enable with signal spniden. 0: Secure Privilege Invasive Debug Disabled, 1: Secure Privilege Invasive Debug Enabled.

Bit.Name: HDPEN
Bit.Description: Hardware Debug Port enable with signal hdpen. 0: Hardware Debug Port Disabled, 1: Hardware Debug Port Enabled.

Bit.Name: DEVICEEN
Bit.Description: Controls the access to Debug component via external debug port by signal deviceen. 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled.

Bit.Name: NIDEN
Bit.Description: Non Invasive Debug enable with signal niden. 0: Non Invasive Debug Disabled, 1: Non Invasive Debug Enabled.

Bit.Name: DBGEN
Bit.Description: Debug enable with signal dbgen. 0: Disabled, 1: Enabled.

Bit.Name: DFTEN
Bit.Description: DFT enable with signal dften. 0: DFT Disabled, 1: DFT Enabled.

Bit.Name: CAN_disable
Bit.Description: 0: CAN interface is enabled, 1: CAN interface is disabled.

Bit.Name: GPU_disable
Bit.Description: 0: GPU enabled, 1: GPU disabled.

Bit.Name: Dual_A7_disable
Bit.Description: 0: Cortex A7 Dual CPU, 1: Cortex A7 Single CPU.

Bit.Name: Crypto_disable
Bit.Description: 0: All crypto HW accelerators are enabled(default), 1: All crypto HW accelerators are disabled for export license control.

Bit.Name: W_R conf
Bit.Description: This Bit determins weither the OTP file will be written in BSEC or programmed in SAFMEM

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_DISTURBED0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last Ring of the corresponding word has been disturbed; abnormal Ring conditions in decoding circuitry and Ring voltages have been detected

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_DISTURBED1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last Ring of the corresponding word has been disturbed; abnormal Ring conditions in decoding circuitry and Ring voltages have been detected

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_DISTURBED2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last Ring of the corresponding word has been disturbed; abnormal Ring conditions in decoding circuitry and Ring voltages have been detected

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_ERROR0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last R operation of the word concerned has revealed a redundancy or ECC check error.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_ERROR1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last R operation of the word concerned has revealed a redundancy or ECC check error.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_ERROR2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the last R operation of the word concerned has revealed a redundancy or ECC check error.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_WRLOCK0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming permenant lock.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_WRLOCK1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming permenant lock.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_WRLOCK2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming permenant lock.

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SPLOCK0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming sticky lock until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SPLOCK1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming sticky lock until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SPLOCK2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that the correspanding OTP word is under programming sticky lock until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SWLOCK0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to write to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SWLOCK1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to write to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SWLOCK2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to write to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SRLOCK0
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to reload to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset. Instead a R command, shall clear the shadow register

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SRLOCK1
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to reload to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset. Instead a R command, shall clear the shadow register

Bit.Name: BSEC_OTP_SRLOCK2
Bit.Description: If the Bit is set to 1 that means that any attempt to reload to the correspanding OTP shadow register will be prevented until next system-reset. Instead a R command, shall clear the shadow register

Bit.Name: CFG0
Bit.Description: These bits determins the OTP mode encoding

Bit.Name: fdis3
Bit.Description: Disable CAN

Bit.Name: fdis2
Bit.Description: Disable GPU

Bit.Name: fdis1
Bit.Description: Disable CPU1

Bit.Name: fdis0
Bit.Description: Disable Crypto (license export)

Bit.Name: rma_force
Bit.Description: RMA force Bit

Bit.Name: rma_relock
Bit.Description: RMA relock Bit

Bit.Name: CFG3
Bit.Description: These bits determins the BOOT source definition

Bit.Name: CFG4
Bit.Description: These bits determins the BOOT monotonic counter

Bit.Name: CFG5
Bit.Description: These bits determins the BOOT AFmux configuration

Bit.Name: CFG6
Bit.Description: These bits determins the BOOT AFmux configuration

Bit.Name: CFG7
Bit.Description: These bits determins the BOOT AFmux configuration

Bit.Name: CFG8
Bit.Description: BOOT/Device configuration.

Bit.Name: rma_relock
Bit.Description: RMA relock Bit

Bit.Name: rma_lock
Bit.Description: RMA lock Bit

Bit.Name: CFG9
Bit.Description: These bits determin the device configuration.

Bit.Name: CFG10
Bit.Description: These bits determin the device configuration.

Bit.Name: CFG11
Bit.Description: These bits determin the device configuration.

Bit.Name: CFG12
Bit.Description: These bits determin the device configuration.

Bit.Name: ID0
Bit.Description: Lot ID on 42bit (11LSB's)

Bit.Name: ID0
Bit.Description: Wafer ID

Bit.Name: ID0
Bit.Description: Wafer Y coordinates

Bit.Name: ID0
Bit.Description: Wafer X coordinates

Bit.Name: ID1
Bit.Description: Lot ID on 42bit (31MSB's)

Bit.Name: ID2
Bit.Description: Test program flow T[12],F[12],Q[12]

Bit.Name: ID2
Bit.Description: FT program revision

Bit.Name: ID2
Bit.Description: EWS program revision

Bit.Name: ECC_USE
Bit.Description: SAFMEM use ECC for Upper OTP bits. 0x0: No, 0x1: Yes, others: reserved.

Bit.Name: SAFMEM_SIZE
Bit.Description: SAFMEM size. 0x2: 2KBits, 0x4: 4KBits, 0x8: 8KBits, others: reserved.

Bit.Name: MAJREV
Bit.Description: IP Version major revision information.

Bit.Name: MINREV
Bit.Description: IP Version minor revision information.

Bit.Description: IP Identification.

Bit.Name: ID
Bit.Description: IP Magic Identification.
